includedNonTaxableProfits.title: Included not-taxable profits
includedNonTaxableProfits.description: Income, receipts and other profits included in business income or expenses but not taxable as business profits. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

basisAdjustment.title: Basis adjustment
basisAdjustment.description: If your basis period is not the same as your accounting period, enter the adjustment needed to arrive at the profit or loss for the basis period – if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99

overlapReliefUsed.title: Overlap relief used
overlapReliefUsed.description: Overlap relief used this year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

accountingAdjustment.title: Accounting adjustment
accountingAdjustment.description: Adjustment for change of accounting practice. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

averagingAdjustment.title: Averaging adjustment
averagingAdjustment.description: Averaging adjustment (only for farmers, market gardeners and creators of literary or artistic works) – if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

lossBroughtForward.title: Loss brought forward
lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

outstandingBusinessIncome.title: Outstanding business income
outstandingBusinessIncome.description: Any other business income not included in other fields. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

balancingChargeBPRA.title: Balancing charge BPRA
balancingChargeBPRA.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (only where Business Premises Renovation Allowance has been claimed). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

balancingChargeOther.title: Balancing charge Other
balancingChargeOther.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for more than their tax value). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

goodsAndServicesOwnUse.title: Goods and services own use
goodsAndServicesOwnUse.description: Value of the normal sale price of goods or stock have been taken out of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
